alfredsnippet.snippet:
"The great achievement of Experts has been the dramatic change in Western society. A few decades ago people emerged from school and college literate and well-educated. That has now changed. Today's young adults are less literate, less educated, and more demoralized than any generation in living memory."

- Brian J. Ford, The Cult of the Expert
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Today's Young Adults are Less Literate, Less Educated and More Demoralized than Any Generation in Living Memory
